channel.title: Blogs on Dixi Yao
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Dixi Yao

item.title: Prepare your application for CS PhD.
item.description: Introduction During my preparation for PhD applications, the most response I got are rejection. However, I also received several offers including MASc/PhD in ECE from University of Toronto, PhD in CS from McGill University, PhD in CS from UMASS, PhD in CS from UTexus Austin, EDIC from EPFL, and PhD in CS from NUS.

item.title: Will technologies in Cyberpunk 2077 be real?
